title: #215: My Fab Yacht Reunion Is Fierce, Okaay?
description:
The "Real Housewives of New York City" reunion powers on, and this week, we take on Dorinda's slurry accusations, Heather's '90s outfit, LuAnn's hatred of Mario, and Ramona's renewal. Then it's on to the season premiere of "Below Deck" as we meet the new crew members of the S.S. Eros. Will Aerosmith appear?
More importantly, will Train show up for "My Fab 40th," or will crazy party planner Sarina screw everything up? Ronnie Karam (trashtalktv.com) and Ben Mandelker (bsideblog.com) discuss it all. Come listen!
You can donate to us at http://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
And remember to like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/watchwhatcrappens
And here's some other stuff:
